scripts.start:dev: cross-env APP_VARIANT=dev EXPO_PUBLIC_APP_VARIANT=dev expo start --dev-client --lan --scheme everfreenote-dev
scripts.start:dev:offline: cross-env APP_VARIANT=dev EXPO_PUBLIC_APP_VARIANT=dev EXPO_PUBLIC_EDITOR_WEBVIEW_URL=file:///android_asset/web-editor/index.html expo start --dev-client --lan --scheme everfreenote-dev
scripts.start:stage: cross-env APP_VARIANT=stage EXPO_PUBLIC_APP_VARIANT=stage expo start --dev-client --lan --scheme everfreenote-stage
scripts.start:prod: cross-env APP_VARIANT=prod EXPO_PUBLIC_APP_VARIANT=prod expo start --dev-client --lan --scheme everfreenote
scripts.prepare:webview-bundle: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_ASSET_PREFIX=./ npm --prefix ../.. run build && node ../../build/copy-web-bundle.js
scripts.android:dev: cross-env APP_VARIANT=dev EXPO_PUBLIC_APP_VARIANT=dev expo run:android --variant devDebug --app-id com.everfreenote.app.dev
scripts.android:stage: cross-env APP_VARIANT=stage EXPO_PUBLIC_APP_VARIANT=stage expo run:android --variant stageDebug --app-id com.everfreenote.app.stage
scripts.android:stage:release: cross-env APP_VARIANT=stage EXPO_PUBLIC_APP_VARIANT=stage expo run:android --variant stageRelease --app-id com.everfreenote.app.stage
scripts.android:prod: cross-env APP_VARIANT=prod EXPO_PUBLIC_APP_VARIANT=prod expo run:android --variant prodDebug --app-id com.everfreenote.app
scripts.android:prod:release: cross-env APP_VARIANT=prod EXPO_PUBLIC_APP_VARIANT=prod expo run:android --variant prodRelease --app-id com.everfreenote.app
scripts.validate: npm run type-check && npm run lint
